comments:
1. Install JAVA 1.4.2
2. Set your JAVA_HOME TO your install location of JAVA 1.4.2
3. Install Tomcat
4. Install ALF SSO
5. Launch Tomcat
6. Inspect the catalina.date.log
7. Notice the following errors indicating ALF SSO failed to launch properly

SEVERE: Error deploying web application directory ALFSSOLogin
java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/eclipse/alf/security/sso/server/federationserver/FedSrvServlet (Unsupported major.minor version 49.0)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass0(Native Method)



Apr 25, 2007 11:16:59 AM org.apache.catalina.startup.HostConfig undeployApps
WARNING: Error while removing context [/ALFSSOLogin]
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.removeChild(ContainerBase.java:883)
